All about the heat

Welcome to Glasgow's biggest hub of chilli fanatics! The club started over the great quarantine of 2020. As the founding members were bored, locked in their flats and houses, they decided to order a few chilli seeds online;the rest was history.

Grow it yourself

Growing chillies is actually dead easy, and by being a member you get access to all of our wonderful resources to help you with potting, germination and growing your own chilli plants in no time whatsoever.

Memberships

Join Strathclyde's exclusive group of chilliheads and we'll help you work towards a bountiful harvest.
